mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.localization.exception.ExpectedSheetException
mdException.label: Expected Sheet Exception
mdException.message: Expected to find a sheet (tab) of name [{sheetName}] in the spreadsheet. This import has failed.

text.name: sheetName
text.label: Sheet Name
text.description: The name of the sheet we expected to find

mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.localization.exception.ExpectedColumnException
mdException.label: Expected Column Exception
mdException.message: Expected to find a column of name [{columnName}] on sheet (tab) of name [{sheetName}] in the spreadsheet. This import has failed.

text.name: columnName
text.label: Column Name
text.description: The name of the column we expected to find.

text.name: sheetName
text.label: Sheet Name
text.description: The name of the sheet we expected to find.

mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.localization.exception.LocaleNotInstalledException
mdException.label: Locale Not Installed Exception
mdException.message: Locale [{localeString}] is not installed. Please install it before importing.

mdWarning.name: com.runwaysdk.localization.exception.LocalizedRowIgnoredWarning
mdWarning.label: Localized Import Row Ignored Warning
mdWarning.description: Thrown when importing the localization spreadsheet and a row references data that cannot be found
mdWarning.message: Ignored row {row} on sheet {sheet} because the data could not be found.
